Posts.Content: Hi my name is Janine, iam 27 years old and i am due to have a elective double masectomy with tissue expanders in 8 weeks. I am an emotional wreak, so worried about the future. I have a loving supportive partner who is amazing, and supports my decision all the way. I wanted to know if anyone has had a double masectomy and how they were the build up to the opp and the recovery period. Its such a worrying time for me and i could do with all the advice possible. Thank for your support Janine h
Posts.Title: elective double masectomy

Posts.Content: Thank u so much for taking the time to reply to me. Janine x
Posts.Title: elective double masectomy
